data.prayer: Lord of the Harvest, please send out workers into the the county of Qinzhou, Guangxi, China.
data.verse: Then he said to his disciples, “The harvest is plentiful but the workers are few. Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Qinzhou, Guangxi, China
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, cause the 13,086 believers in Qinzhou to obey with immediate, radical, costly obedience, like Abraham.
data.verse: Then God said, “Take your son, your only son, whom you love — Isaac — and go to the region of Moriah. Sacrifice him there as a burnt offering on a mountain I will show you.” Early the next morning Abraham got up and loaded his donkey. He took with him two of his servants and his son Isaac. When he had cut enough wood for the burnt offering, he set out for the place God had told him about.

data.prayer: Father, like with the Ethiopian Eunuch, set up a meeting today between a faithful believer in Qinzhou, Guangxi, China and a person seeking to understand the truth.
data.verse: The eunuch asked Philip, “Tell me, please, who is the prophet talking about, himself or someone else?” Then Philip began with that very passage of Scripture and told him the good news about Jesus.

data.prayer: Lord, please provide elders whose hearts are completely yours in every town in the county of Qinzhou.
data.verse: The reason I left you in Crete was that you might put in order what was left unfinished and appoint elders in every town, as I directed you.

data.prayer: Jesus, I pray that all the Pusha people will remember and turn to you, Lord God. May all the Pusha people worship before you. For the kingdom of the Pusha people is yours.
Father, please raise up prophets in Qinzhou who can call the church to holiness and purity, preparing your church as a bride for your Son.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Father, you desire the people in the county of Qinzhou who are far from you to hear about you.
data.verse: "Those who were not told about him will see, and those who have not heard will understand."

data.prayer: Spirit, please give new believers a yearning to see you praised in Qinzhou, Guangxi, China.
data.verse: Declare his glory among the nations, his marvelous deeds among all peoples.

location.name: Qinzhou
location.people_groups_list: Hmu, Southern, Iu Mien, Poluo, Iu Mien, Hunan, Numao
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Hmu, Southern (857,000), Iu Mien (1,303,000), Poluo (33,000), Iu Mien, Hunan (225,000), Numao (2,300)
